website_summaries.verdict: Packed with numerous features, this lightweight ladder has a particularly strong safety focus.
pros: Ladder is a lightweight 23 lb., and can hold 250 lb
Has a patented One-Touch release mechanism, and safety indicators so you'll know when it's locked
cons: Some problems reported with it becoming difficult to retract after a few uses
A few buyers report problems with it arriving in used condition or broken

customer_reviews.title: Read the information Closely
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good. I have one of this that is 12' that works fine. I wanted a taller one so I ordered the 16' ladder. It turns out that this one was 12', and the "16' reach" is the additional 4' reach you have when you risk extending yourself above the top rung. Simply misleading product information, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C

customer_reviews.title: Ladder wont retract
customer_reviews.text: It no longer retracts after 12 uses. The very first retractable step seems to be looked and not letting the others retract. I had to leave it at the jobsite after getting on a roof because I couldn't get it into my trunk. Owned it less than 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Drum

customer_reviews.title: Beats the knockoffs by a mile!
customer_reviews.text: There is no fair comparison between this Telesteps ladder and the China-built lookalikes. It does cost twice as much, but one avoided fall or crushed finger more than makes up for the price difference. The collapse feature is a beauty to watch! The legs are slightly oval instead of round like the others. The very top rung has a thick rubber cover that protects the surface you lean it against. Very nice ladder!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Stability has improved
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced my last Telesteps ladder which lasted me 20 years. This one has articulating feet, unlike the old one with rounded feet--feels much more secure. It also collapsed more readily. Sooo, better features and hopefully as durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one used, saved a bunch of money. So far, this ladder has been incredible, I wish I would have sprung for one years ago. It will replace several existing ladders that I have. Awesome product. Very compact, fairly light, easy to use and sturdy. I weight 225 pounds and have not had any issues regarding weight or utility.
customer_reviews.author: FLY NAVY

customer_reviews.title: Felt uncomfortable using
customer_reviews.text: I was uncomfortable with locking mechanism. I was afraid to use it, not knowing if it will collapse on me. Expands all or nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ladder for lofts
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is the best. We have tall ceilings and a loft and this is the perfect leaning ladder. I always feel safe using this and it is easy to extend and to put away. I love this ladder and I suspect you will as well
customer_reviews.author: jennyb

customer_reviews.title: 28 pounds and collapses small enough to easily carry around or leave in the trunk of my ...
customer_reviews.text: 28 pounds and collapses small enough to easily carry around or leave in the trunk of my car. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: This latter is awesome I bought it to get up on my 5th ...
customer_reviews.text: This latter is awesome I bought it to get up on my 5th wheel work great no complaints goes up comes down I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Steve kirkes

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We are most pleased with this ladder to use with our tall fifth wheel camper. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Mcmillen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy but it does the job. I use it about once a month
customer_reviews.author: Naturalist

customer_reviews.title: great extension ladder
customer_reviews.text: I love this ladder. When I was buying my townhouse, my home inspector had one. It's easy to operate and doesn't take up much space. Much easier to operate than other types of extension ladders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect with this ladder but it has worked very well for me. Collapses and stores easily. Very light as well.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Let's me get on top of my RV.
customer_reviews.author: Plowboy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our Field Adjusters love this product! it arrived on time as promised. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy ladder.
customer_reviews.text: Tried out the new ladder on my RV travel trailer this past weekend. Ladder is very easy to open and close if you follow the directions included. It felt study opened in the full position as I used it on my trailer to install some new gutter spout drip extenders. It should be easy to put in the back of my pickup truck in case it's needed on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: NDallas75002

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder but keep clean or may jamb up, but they replaced my 1800 even after is was slightly out of waranty
customer_reviews.text: works great for a backup to my heavier one or if have a lower roof and don't need my 1800
customer_reviews.author: Jim Brady

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. It's a little tricky to use in some cases but over all i like it.
customer_reviews.author: ZG.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome compact ladder. Perfect for our newly acquired motor home.
customer_reviews.author: IdahoRelic

customer_reviews.title: I read mixed reviews on this but it has worked ...
customer_reviews.text: I read mixed reviews on this but it has worked well for me so far. I do keep it in my Rv basement for storage
customer_reviews.author: Pat Burger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to extend
customer_reviews.text: Compact enough to store in motorhome basement. Easy to extend, strong and easy to retract.
customer_reviews.author: Compusew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not seriously used so far. Seems as advertised. Heavier than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ladder is not safe and is only 12-1/2 ft long, not 16’ as they claim
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Carachure

customer_reviews.title: The best brand of telescoping ladders
customer_reviews.text: Telesteps exceeds my expectations. The original telesteps was easy to use. The new 1600e makes it even easier to operate. I use this ladder on a daily basis to inspect homes.
customer_reviews.author: michael malek

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ladder extends to 12 foot. Not 16 foot as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.Hammock

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This item was sold as new. It was not new, didn't extend, box had been opened ripped tapped and the ladder is not a Telesteps but a different brand. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH GRAHAM

customer_reviews.title: OK NEW ;  GARBAGE IN 5 YEARS ; NO CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: USED A COUPLE OF TIMES A YEAR. CHINA RUBBER FEET FELL APART THIS YEAR AND THE LADDER CAN"T BE USED WITHOUT THEM. NO ONE CAN GET THE FEET AND TELESTEPS WON'T SELL THEM TO A CUSTOMER. ANOTHER PIECE OF LANDFILL !!! GARBAGE LADDER; GARBAGE COMPANY !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

product_meta.title: Telesteps 1600E OSHA Compliant 16 ft Reach Telescoping Extension Ladder
product_meta.description:
Revolutionary Telesteps 12.5 ft. telescoping extension ladder is made from high quality aluminum alloys. It gives the user a 16 FT reach and retracts to a mere 30 inches in height and can be stored anywhere traditional ladders just won’t fit. This ladder can be used at full extension when raised from the top rung, or by the foot when raised from the bottom rung, at just the right height needed. This telescoping extension ladder features fully automatic extension and retraction with a patented one touch release mechanism for ease of use. This ladder is OSHA certified, and ANSI 14.2 tested with a 250 LBS Type 1 duty rating. Equipped with 100% Silicone pivoting feet for safe grip on the substrate and elliptical tubes for strength, these ladders are built with safety in mind. Trusted by the US Military and Law Enforcement teams, the Telesteps telescoping ladders are the original design and the world’s only fully automatic telescoping ladders. Telesteps ladders are Easy to Use, Easy to Carry, and Easy to Store. Use them at home, at the office, jobsite, boat, RV, farm, hunting, or anywhere you may need a ladder.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Revolutionary Telesteps 12.5 ft. telescoping extension ladder. Made from high quality Aluminum alloys this ladder can be used at full extension or by the foot at just the right height needed. This telescoping extension ladder features fully automatic extension and retraction with a patented one touch release mechanism for ease of use. 250 LBS Type 1 duty rating this telescopic extension ladder gives the user a 16 ft. reach and retracts to a mere 30 inches in height and can be stored anywhere traditional ladders just wont fit. Equiped with 100% Silicone swivel feet for safe grip on the substrate and Elliptical tubes for strength these ladders are built with safety in mind. Trusted by the US Military and Swat teams the Telesteps telescoping ladders are the original design and the World's only fully automatic telescoping ladders. Telesteps ladders are Easy to Use, Easy to Carry and Easy to Store. Use them at home, at the office, Cottage, Boat, Motorhome or anywhere you may need a ladder.
feature_bullets: 12.5 ft. Telescoping extension ladder, Gives same climbing height as a 16 feet extension ladder
Fully automatic operation up and down with patented One-Touch release mechanism
100% Silicone pivoting feet for safe grip
